page.title: 11STAMFORD FORT
page.content: The fort was built in Victorian times by Lord Palmerston as a defence in the port of Plymouth. It became a {sports centre}eight years ago. Its facilities are fourteen squash courts, one{swimming pool},four full-sized snooker tables, space invaders room, bars, restaurants, disco, sauna, two solariums and a carvery. The fort gives qualified{squash}coaching. The most popular sport at the fort is squash. The age group varies from babies to pensioners. The fort has no plans for the future and ten people work there. The swimming pool area has the temperature of 84 degrees, club night is every Saturday from 7.00 pm to 10.45 pm. There are also{holiday {flatlets .Caravans} are contained in the fortress battlements with enough washing facilities to cater for them.
